data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre blows against Toluca's Alexis Canelo for offside.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Toluca drive forward but Haret Ortega is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 7, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Toluca's half.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Mexico City Toluca drive forward through Alexis Canelo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Erik Lira's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Diego Gonzalez of Toluca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Erik Lira gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 25, Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Diego Gonzalez, who is grimacing with pain.
Toluca's Diego Gonzalez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 29, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Toluca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Toluca's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Erik Lira (Pumas UNAM) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
In the minute 35, Toluca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Toluca.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 39, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Nicolas Freire of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 42, The match at Estadio Olimpico Universitario has been interrupted briefly for a check on Michael Estrada, who is down injured.
Michael Estrada is back on the pitch.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre waits before resuming play because William da Silva for Toluca is still down.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Toluca advance rapidly upfield but Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre blows for offside.
In the minute 47, Free kick Toluca.
William da Silva for Toluca is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 48, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 51, Toluca's Michael Estrada has been booked in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM's Favio Alvarez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 53, Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Toluca are whistled for offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 60, Toluca's Michael Estrada gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Carlos Gonzalez is replacing Carlos Gutierrez for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 62, Toluca's Enrique Triverio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 64, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Free kick in a good position for Pumas UNAM!
In the minute 65, Gaston Sauro is booked for the away team.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Toluca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 68, In Mexico City Toluca attack through William da Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Facundo Waller is on a sub for Juan Iturbe for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Toluca.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Haret Ortega (Toluca) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Toluca.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 75, Own goal in Mexico City! Luis Garcia scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 81, Toluca are caught offside.
Toluca's Alexis Canelo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pumas UNAM defender.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 85, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a third substitution, with Gerardo Moreno replacing Favio Alvarez.
In the minute 87, Isaias Violante is replacing Raul Lopez for Toluca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Kevin Castaneda is replacing Antonio Rios for the away team.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 89, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the home team a throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
